actor_awards.notes: A prolific character actor best known for his distinctive voice and delivery. He is immortalized for the line 'What we've got here is failure to communicate' in 'Cool Hand Luke'. Before acting, he was a swimming instructor and a nationally ranked diver.

filmography.title: Cool Hand Luke
filmography.role_description: The sadistic prison warden who delivers the iconic line about 'failure to communicate' while tormenting the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A laid-back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

filmography.title: The Wild Bunch
filmography.role_description: A scruffy, bloodthirsty bounty hunter pursuing the outlaw gang alongside Robert Ryan's character.
filmography.plot: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the 'traditional' American West is disappearing around them.

filmography.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
filmography.role_description: The colorful mine boss in Bolivia who hires Butch and Sundance as payroll guards.
filmography.plot: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

filmography.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
filmography.role_description: One of Liberty Valance's cackling, thuggish henchmen.
filmography.plot: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.

filmography.title: True Grit
filmography.role_description: A horse trader who haggles sharply with the young Mattie Ross.
filmography.plot: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian territory.

filmography.title: Slap Shot
filmography.role_description: The beleaguered general manager of the Charlestown Chiefs hockey team.
filmography.plot: A failing ice hockey team finds success using constant fighting and violence during games.

filmography.title: Up in Smoke
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, disapproving father of Pedro (Cheech Marin).
filmography.plot: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van made entirely of marijuana from Mexico to Los Angeles, with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

filmography.title: McLintock!
filmography.role_description: The nervous and somewhat incompetent Indian agent.
filmography.plot: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

filmography.title: The Horse Soldiers
filmography.role_description: A rebel deserter who aids the Union cavalry.
filmography.plot: A Union Cavalry outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in strength to destroy a rail/supply center.

filmography.title: Kiss Me Deadly
filmography.role_description: A truck driver who plays a small but key role in the noir mystery.
filmography.plot: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious 'great whatsit'.

filmography.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
filmography.role_description: A character involved in the mystery surrounding the Elder family's lost ranch.
filmography.plot: Four brothers reunite in their Texas hometown to attend their mother's funeral and investigate the mysterious circumstances of her death.

filmography.title: Harper
filmography.role_description: A false religious prophet and cult leader encountered by the private investigator.
filmography.plot: Private investigator Lew Harper is hired by a wealthy woman to investigate the disappearance of her husband.

filmography.title: Hard Times
filmography.role_description: An opium-addicted former medical student who acts as the cutman for a street fighter.
filmography.plot: In the Depression, a drifter and a gambler team up to make money in illegal bare-knuckle fighting.

filmography.title: The Ballad of Cable Hogue
filmography.role_description: One of the men who originally leaves Cable Hogue to die in the desert.
filmography.plot: A hobo is accidentally left to die in the desert where he discovers a water spring, and transforms it into a profitable way-station.

filmography.title: Rooster Cogburn
filmography.role_description: A cantankerous ferryman who aids Rooster and Eula.
filmography.plot: Rooster Cogburn teams up with a spinster missionary to track down a gang of outlaws.

filmography.title: Nevada Smith
filmography.role_description: One of the outlaws who kills the protagonist's parents, sparking a revenge mission.
filmography.plot: A mixed-race cowboy sets out to avenge the brutal murder of his parents by three outlaws.

filmography.title: Shenandoah
filmography.role_description: A train engineer involved in the Civil War conflict.
filmography.plot: A Virginia farmer declines to join the Confederate army because he does not own slaves and does not want to fight for the North because he is a Virginian.

filmography.title: Pocket Money
filmography.role_description: A shady businessman who recruits two cowboys for a cattle drive scheme.
filmography.plot: A cowboy in debt gets involved in a get-rich-quick cattle scheme that goes wrong.

filmography.title: The Brotherhood of Satan
filmography.role_description: The leader of a satanic cult in a small town.
filmography.plot: A family is trapped in a desert town by a cult of senior citizens who recruit the town's children to worship Satan.

filmography.title: The Shaggy Dog
filmography.role_description: A henchman involved in the spy plot in this Disney comedy.
filmography.plot: A boy turns into a sheepdog at inopportune moments due to an ancient ring.

filmography.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter
filmography.role_description: A townsperson in a film about a town that hires a gunfighter to deal with an outlaw.
filmography.plot: When Confederate soldier Matt Weaver returns to town, he finds his home sold by the town boss. The town hires a gunfighter to kill him.

filmography.title: Hannie Caulder
filmography.role_description: One of the three Clemens brothers who rape the protagonist and kill her husband.
filmography.plot: A woman enlists the help of a bounty hunter to teach her how to use a gun so she can hunt down the three men who raped her and killed her husband.

filmography.title: The Villain
filmography.role_description: A character in this spoof of westerns, playing on his typecast image.
filmography.plot: A beautiful woman is escorted across the west by a handsome cowboy while being pursued by a bumbling villain.

filmography.title: The End
filmography.role_description: A doctor in this black comedy about a dying man.
filmography.plot: A man who is told he has a terminal illness decides to take his own life, but finds it more difficult than he expected.

filmography.title: The Asphalt Jungle
filmography.role_description: A small, uncredited role as a man in a police lineup in this noir classic.
filmography.plot: A major heist goes off as planned, until bad luck and double crosses cause everything to unravel.
